content.html: Coventry Amazon workers in @GMB_union are on the verge of winning union recognition after recruiting 700 members 💪🏽🚩 This would be the first time Amazon UK has been forced to recognise a union. Well done to the organisers! Next step: £15 an hour ✊🏽
content.value:
Coventry Amazon workers in @GMB_union are on the verge of winning union recognition after recruiting 700 members 💪🏽🚩

This would be the first time Amazon UK has been forced to recognise a union.

Well done to the organisers! Next step: £15 an hour ✊🏽
